meanings.definition: A small box on a computer screen that can be clicked to select an option or perform a function.
meanings.sent1: I clicked on the checkboxes to choose my favorite color.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check all the checkboxes before submitting the form.
meanings.sent3: The checkboxes on the screen were like tiny treasure chests waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up as she discovered the hidden checkboxes on the webpage.
meanings.sent5: The checkboxes on the website were as colorful as a box of crayons.

meanings.definition: A small box on a form that can be marked with a check to indicate a choice or completion.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to mark the checkboxes for your preferred meal options.
meanings.sent2: She quickly filled out the form, ticking off the checkboxes as she went.
meanings.sent3: The checkboxes on the paper seemed to dance as she checked them off one by one.
meanings.sent4: His completion of the checkboxes was like a finishing touch on the form.
meanings.sent5: The checkboxes on the form were like little helpers guiding her through the choices.
